sex L1544_J_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_J_sex_2m_r43.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 43

sex L1544_KS_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_Ks_sex_2m_r29.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 29

sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r29.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 29
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r31.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 31
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r33.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 33
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r35.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 35
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r37.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 37
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r39.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 39
sex L1544_H_sub.fits -CATALOG_NAME ../curve_of_growths/L1544_H_sex_2m_r41.txt -PHOT_APERTURES 41

python zeropoint.py -img L1544/L1544_J_sub.fits -sf L1544/L1544_J_sex_2m_r41.txt -tm L1544/2mass_L1544.tbl 

python zeropoint.py -img L1544/L1544_H_sub.fits -sf L1544/L1544_H_sex_2m_r31.txt -tm L1544/2mass_L1544.tbl -b H

python zeropoint.py -img L1544/L1544_Ks_sub.fits -sf L1544/L1544_Ks_sex_2m_r31.txt -tm L1544/2mass_L1544.tbl -b Ks
python zeropoint.py -img L1544/L1544_Ks_sub.fits -sf L1544/L1544_Ks_sex_2m_r33.txt -tm L1544/2mass_L1544.tbl -b Ks
